com.wisper.cli

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wisper.cli.Option
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Flag

    public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Option or Flag, e.g. --log-level 2 or -verbose
    Author:
    Tobias Marstaller

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Option(boolean isFlag, java.lang.String... names)
      Constructs a new option or flag.
      Option(java.lang.Object defaultValue, java.lang.String... names)
      Constructs a new option that defaults to defaultValue and that accepts any value.
      Option(java.lang.String... names)
      Constructs a new flag.
      Option(ValueFilter filter, java.lang.Object defaultValue, java.lang.String... names)
      Constructs a new option that is not required, whichs values are checked by filter and that defaults to defaultValue.
      Option(ValueFilter filter, java.lang.String... names)
      Constructs a new option that is not required and whichs values are checked by filter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getDefaultValue()
      Returns the default value for this option or null if none is set or this is a flag.

      Returns the primary identifier for this option.

      Returns whether any of this options/flags aliases is ambigous with any of the aliases of the given flag/option.
      boolean isFlag()
      Returns whether this instance represents a flag or an option.
      boolean isIdentifiedBy(java.lang.String name)
      Returns whether the given name identifies this flag/option.
      java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String value)
      Parses the given value to the type required by this option.
